description: System-generated unique identifier for this person record; primary key used to link to other tables.
Person’s given name used for identification and communications.
Optional middle-name initial for the person.
Person’s family/surname used for identification and sorting.
Primary email address for this person; used for notifications and possibly login credentials.
Main telephone contact for this person, may include extension.
Secondary telephone number for reaching this person.
Fax number associated with this person or their office.
Name of the organization employing this person.
Employer-assigned payroll/HR identifier for this person.
Job title or role; may drive permissions, workflow, or display.
Foreign key to time zone definition used to display local dates/times for this person.
Street address line(s) for this person’s mailing or work location.
Foreign key to country reference table for this person’s address.
Foreign key to state/province reference table tied to the person’s address.
City component of the person’s address.
Postal or ZIP code for the person’s address.
Identifier assigned by an external vendor to this person; used for vendor integrations.
Flag indicating the account is managed via Active Directory/LDAP; affects authentication and provisioning.
Mobile number for voice and SMS contact.
Foreign key to mobile carrier; likely used for SMS gateway routing; confirm with SME.
